double bdsp::filter::Biquad::process ( double x)
virtual

Definition at line 37 of file Biquad.cpp.

38 {
39 if (structure == BiquadStructure::DIRECT)
40 {
41 // y[n] = a0*x[n] + a1*x[n-1] + a2*x[n-2] - b1*y[n-1] - b2*y[n-2]
42 double y = coefficients[A0] * x +
43 coefficients[A1] * state_registers[X_Z1] +
44 coefficients[A2] * state_registers[X_Z2] -
45 coefficients[B1] * state_registers[Y_Z1] -
46 coefficients[B2] * state_registers[Y_Z2];
47
48 utility::fix_underflow(y);
49
50 // Update state registers
51 state_registers[X_Z2] = state_registers[X_Z1];
52 state_registers[X_Z1] = x;
53 state_registers[Y_Z2] = state_registers[Y_Z1];
54 state_registers[Y_Z1] = y;
55
56 return y;
57 }
58 else if (structure == BiquadStructure::CANONICAL)
59 {
60 // w[n] = x[n] - b1*x[n-1] - b2*x[n-2]
61 double w = x - coefficients[B1] * state_registers[X_Z1] - coefficients[B2] * state_registers[X_Z2];
62
63 // y[n] = a0*w[n] + a1*x[n-1] + a2*x[n-2];
64 double y = coefficients[A0] * w + coefficients[A1] * state_registers[X_Z1] + coefficients[A2] * state_registers[X_Z2];
65
66 utility::fix_underflow(y);
67
68 // Update state registers
69 state_registers[X_Z2] = state_registers[X_Z1];
70 state_registers[X_Z1] = w;
71
72 return y;
73 }
74 else if (structure == BiquadStructure::TRANSPOSED_DIRECT)
75 {
76 // w[n] = x[n] + y[n-1]
77 double w = x + state_registers[Y_Z1];
78
79 // y[n] = a0*w[n] + x[n-1]
80 double y = coefficients[A0] * w + state_registers[X_Z1];
81
82 utility::fix_underflow(y);
83
84 // Update state registers
85 state_registers[Y_Z1] = state_registers[Y_Z2] - coefficients[B1] * w;
86 state_registers[Y_Z2] = -coefficients[B2] * w;
87 state_registers[X_Z1] = state_registers[X_Z2] + coefficients[A1] * w;
88 state_registers[X_Z2] = coefficients[A2] * w;
89
90 return y;
91 }
92 else if (structure == BiquadStructure::TRANSPOSED_CANONICAL)
93 {
94 // y[n] = a0*x[n] + x[n-1]
95 double y = coefficients[A0] * x + state_registers[X_Z1];
96
97 utility::fix_underflow(y);
98
99 // Update state registers
100 state_registers[X_Z1] = coefficients[A1] * x - coefficients[B1] * y + state_registers[X_Z2];
101 state_registers[X_Z2] = coefficients[A2] * x - coefficients[B2] * y;
102
103 return y;
104 }
105
106 return x; // Unknown structure -> pass-through!
107 }
